resources.string: Choose applications you don\'t want to be displayed on the widget
Turn on to automatically populate the widget with the most frequently used applications
Turn off to manually add the applications to the widget
Manually select applications to populate the widget
Colour or texture will be used for shortcut backgrounds
Erases all applications on the widget
This action will reset the widget, erasing all application shortcuts. Reset widget?
This is the Activity graph widget, a cool and easy way to find your favourite applications on your Home screen.
You can choose your preferred way to populate this widget:
You have chosen automatic setup. Once you start using the applications on your phone, this widget will be updated automatically with your most used applications.
You can change this preference in the widget settings. Widget settings can be found through widget setting button on the upper right corner of widget.
Touch to start adding applications to the widget.
Widget settings can be found through widget setting button on the upper right corner of widget.
Automatically. It will be populated automatically by your most used applications.
Manually. You will manually add the applications to the widget.
Use the graph to choose 9 applications to populate your widget. You\'ll have easy access to these applications right on your Home screen panel.
